dict.string: This app needs camera access to capture photos and videos for forensic record keeping purposes.
This app needs microphone access to record audio and video with sound for forensic evidence.
This app needs access to your photo library to catalog screenshots and media for forensic records.
This app needs permission to save captured media to your photo library.
This app needs screen recording permission to capture screen recordings for forensic evidence.
This app requires system administration access for monitoring and capturing forensic evidence.
This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate and protect your forensic records.
